devdoc.details: The State Transitioner Factory is used by the Fraud Verifier to create a new State Transitioner during the initialization of a fraud proof. Compiler used: solc Runtime target: EVM

params._preStateRoot: State root before the transition was executed.
params._stateTransitionIndex: Index of the state transition being verified.

params._name: Name to resolve an address for.

returns._0: Address associated with the given name.

devdoc.title: OVM_StateTransitionerFactory

resolve(string).notice: Resolves the address associated with a given name.
